site_name:
92-94 High Street And 1B Throwley Way
Sutton
SM1 1LT
description: Part demolition of and part retention of the front commercial units including an increase in roof height to provide outdoor residential amenity space and erection of an attached 12 storey building to provide 44 self contained residential units ( including 22 x 1-bedroomed, 20 x 2-bedroomed and 2 x 3-bedroomed units), provision of car parking accessed from Throwley Way, refuse and cycle stores and the conversion of the rear commercial unit, 1B Throwley Way into a concierge unit and substation.
